SEARCH

All Classes and Interfaces

Class
Description
Barrel2Server
Initializes and registers the Barrel2 RMI server.
BarrelImpl
Implementation of the IBarrel interface for RMI-based indexing and search services.
BarrelServer
Initializes and registers the Barrel1 RMI server.
BarrelStats
Collects and provides statistics for a Barrel, such as response times and size.
Downloader
The Downloader class is responsible for fetching URLs from a queue, processing their contents, and distributing indexed data to remote barrels.
FrontendApplication
Main entry point for the Spring Boot Frontend application.
Gateway
The Gateway class is a server-side RMI implementation that handles interactions between various barrels and a queue service.
IBarrel
The IBarrel interface defines the remote methods that can be invoked by clients on databases.
IGateway
The IGateway interface defines the methods for a remote Gateway object that provides various operations related to URL management, search, statistics, and Barrel management.
IQueue
Interface for a queue that handles URLs and stopwords in a remote context.
IStatistics
Remote interface for receiving real-time statistics updates from a remote server.
Main
Main class representing the client interface for interacting with the distributed search engine system.
QueueImp
Implementation of the IQueue interface using file storage and Java RMI.
QueueServer
Starts the RMI server for the Queue service.
RmiClientService
Service class responsible for connecting to the Gateway RMI server and receiving real-time system statistics updates.
SearchResult
Represents the result of a search query, containing matched URLs and metadata.
SystemStatistics
Represents the system's statistics, including:
WebController
Main Spring MVC controller for handling web requests related to search, URL insertion, OpenAI integration, and system statistics.
WebSocketConfig
Configuration class for enabling and setting up WebSocket messaging using STOMP protocol in Spring Boot.
